name: Dinomist Ceratops
description:
Pendulum Effect
 If another "Dinomist" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.

 Monster Effect
 If all monsters you control are "Dinomist" monsters (min. 1), and none are "Dinomist Ceratops", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).
